food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys go crazy for me!
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
〰️ I grow in bunches.

food.question: I am red and round, and I grow on trees. Sometimes I'm used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Snow White loved me, but not the poisoned one!
🍏 I keep the doctor away!
🥧 I can be baked into a pie.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with your breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I make your bones strong.
🥣 You can pour me on your cereal.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack!
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 I can help you see better.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. I'm good for you to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 They go 'pop' when you eat them!
🌱 I grow in a long green home.
🥣 You can find me in some soups.

food.question: I am made from wheat, and you can spread jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can put me in a toaster!
🌾 I am made from a grain.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a fruit, but I am also a color! What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am a mix of yellow and red.
☀️ A vitamin you can find in me is vitamin C.
🍹 You can make juice from me.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a tiny forest.
🥦 My color is green.
💪 Eating me will make you strong!

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is cold and creamy. You can eat me in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am best on a hot day.
🍧 I am often served in a cone or a cup.
🍫 I come in many flavors like chocolate and vanilla.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside with tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name is the same as a bird from New Zealand.
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon.
🌱 The outside is fuzzy, and the inside is green.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange and crunchy.
🌱 I grow under the dirt.
🐰 I'm a yummy treat for rabbits.

plant.question: I am tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a big brown trunk.
🍃 My leaves change colors in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many different colors.
💐 People give me as gifts.
🐝 I help bees make honey.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and make a yummy red sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am round and juicy.
🌿 I grow in a garden.
🍝 I taste good on pasta.

plant.question: I am long and yellow, and you have to peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 🍌 I'm a very popular fruit.
🌍 I grow in warm places.
🙊 Monkeys peel me to eat me.

plant.question: I am a plant that is very tall and has a thick stalk. You can eat me for dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Animals and people eat me.
🔆 I need lots of sunshine to grow.
🍿 Sometimes I pop!

plant.question: I have prickles and smell nice. People send me to show they care. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a very popular flower
🥀 I can be red, pink, yellow, or white.
🛡️ Watch out for my thorns!

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind. Inside, I am red and have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm very juicy and good in the summer.
🌱 You can grow me from a seed.
⛱️ You might eat me at a picnic.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to bury me for the winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I fall from trees in the autumn.
🐿️ Animals hide me.
🔨 You need something strong to crack me open.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant with rings inside my trunk that show how old I am. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 People use me to build houses.
🧭 You can tell direction by looking at my moss.
🍁 I provide shade on sunny days.
